title: BigSimple Wear Watchface
summary: Watchface for Wear!Just the Time Big and Simple!
description: BIG SIMPLE Watch Face for WEAR DEVICES.Official API Support, some Features will be added back soon! *Instructions*-Pair your device with watch.-Install the application-Choose the watch face from your Wear watch.*Note:* Please choose the watchface on your Wear Smartwatch, before sending the changes to the wear device.
descriptionHTML:
BIG SIMPLE Watch Face for WEAR DEVICES.

Official API Support, some Features will be added back soon!

*Instructions*
-Pair your device with watch.
-Install the application
-Choose the watch face from your Wear watch.

*Note:* Please choose the watchface on your Wear Smartwatch, before sending the changes to the wear device.
comments: I'll be the 2nd then Unless you're military, here in the states we dont use 24hr time. Thank you though. I will add this to my collection when 12hr is added. Thanks.

Euro Time??? We don't tell time in 24hr format here in the United States. Please add 12hr format as well. Also the date and month should be formatted Monday/October/20... Uninstalling and will check back for an update. There is a rest of the world too. Had installed for over 2 months and I'm sure I'm not the first to mention this.
Love the design. 24-hour time is much cooler than 12-hour time. Easier to set an alarm to and not confuse am with pm. What's so difficult about deducting 12 from a number to figure out the time?
Needs more work Needs a 12 hour mode and more customization features.
recentChanges: * added option to change all colors
